article.title: Raytheon to Reduce GPS Control Station Crew Size
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Raytheon Intelligence and Information Systems, Aurora, Colo., is being awarded a $26,300,000 cost-plus-incentive-fee and cost-plus-award-fee modification contract for GPS operator control station minimized crew manning to reduce crew size from eight to four personnel. The contracting activity is Space and Missile Center, Los Angeles Air Force Base, Calif.
